title: Pearl Export Exx Series Drum Kit - 5-Piece Set
description: The Pearl Export Exx Series Drum Kit is a top-notch 5-piece drum set designed for drummers seeking both quality and affordability. This kit includes a 22" x 18" bass drum, 10" x 7" and 12" x 8" rack toms, a 16" x 16" floor tom, and a 14" x 5.5" snare drum, all crafted from 6-ply poplar for a well-balanced sound. The chrome hardware includes double-braced stands and a drum pedal, ensuring stability and reliability during performances. The black wrap finish adds a sleek, modern look to the kit while also offering durability. Whether youâ€™re just starting out or looking to upgrade, this drum set offers a versatile sound suitable for various musical styles.

title: Pearl Export Exx Series Drum Kit - Black Wrap Finish
description: The Pearl Export Exx Series Drum Kit with a Black Wrap Finish combines exceptional sound quality with a stylish appearance. This 5-piece drum set includes a 22" x 18" bass drum, 10" x 7" and 12" x 8" rack toms, a 16" x 16" floor tom, and a 14" x 5.5" snare drum, all made from 6-ply poplar for a rich, resonant tone. The set features chrome hardware, including double-braced stands, a durable drum pedal, and drumsticks. The black wrap finish not only looks great but also ensures the drum shells are protected from wear and tear. Ideal for both practice and performance, this drum kit delivers a great sound at an excellent value.
